examples: The sun is above the horizon.
Please write your name above the line.
O sol está acima do horizonte.
Por favor, escreva seu nome acima da linha.

suggested: Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing way up above.
The clouds above me seem to mirror my own sense of gloom and heaviness.
The CEO's salary was way above what the average worker could ever hope to earn, leading to widespread employee discontent.
Did you know that birds can see ultraviolet light, which helps them navigate by detecting patterns in the sky and clouds above?
The crisp scent of fresh mountain air above the treeline.
The thrill of being high up above the ground on a roller coaster or bungee jump.
Looking up at the vast expanse of stars above can help put our own problems into perspective and remind us of our place in the universe.
